pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.model

Class Lecture

  • java.lang.Object
    • pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.model.Lecture

  • public class Lecture
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the model of the lecture entity. If has a foreign key connection to course of studies, module and category. These are all to locate where the lecture stands within the whole model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lecture(int courseOfStudiesId, int moduleId, java.lang.String name, int credits, boolean obligation, int categoryId, java.lang.String language)
      Create a new lecture.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lecture

        public Lecture(int courseOfStudiesId,
               int moduleId,
               java.lang.String name,
               int credits,
               boolean obligation,
               int categoryId,
               java.lang.String language)
        Create a new lecture. The grade is set to 0 at the beginning.
        Parameters:
        courseOfStudiesId - the id of the course of studies the lecture belongs to
        moduleId - the id of the module the lecture belongs to
        name - the name of the lecture
        credits - the credits of the lecture
        obligation - if the lecture is obligate
        categoryId - the id of the category the lecture belongs to
        language - the language the lecture is in
